meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7988.

td.p: Vicki Leibeck-Owsley, a high school English teacher from Columbia, Kentucky
Alexandra Bicks, a high school ESL teacher from Cambridge, Massachusetts
Francois Barcomb, an 11th grade physics teacher from New Paltz, New York

tr.td: RECENT BESTSELLERS
WOMEN OLYMPIANS
THE ELEMENTS
SPELL THE BEANS
(Alex: Each response is a type of bean that you're going to have to spell for us.)
EDUCATIONAL GAMES
WORDS IN TEACHER
